name: Peanut Butter Bars
ingredients: 1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine, melted 1 cup peanut butter
2 cups graham cracker crumbs 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips
2 cups confectioner's sugar 4 tablespoons peanut butter
steps: In a medium bowl, mix together the butter or margarine, graham cracker crumbs, confectioner's sugar, and 1 cup
peanut butter until well blended. Press evenly into bottom of an ungreased 9x13 inch pan.
In a metal bowl over simmering water, or in microwave, melt the chocolate chips with peanut butter; stirring
occasionally until smooth. Spread over the prepared crust. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before cutting
